kernel

Interface CommunicationModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCommunicationModel, ChannelCommunicationModel, StandardCommunicationModel

    public interface CommunicationModel
    A model of communication. Implementers are responsible for determining what communications are received by each agent in the world.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Command> getHearing(Entity agent)
      Get the set of hear commands an agent can hear.
      void initialise(Config config, WorldModel<? extends Entity> world)
      Initialise this communication model.
      void process(int time, java.util.Collection<? extends Command> agentCommands)
      Process a set of agent commands and work out what communications each agent can hear.

    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        void initialise(Config config,
              WorldModel<? extends Entity> world)
        Initialise this communication model.
        Parameters:
        config - The kernel configuration.
        world - The world model.

      • process

        void process(int time,
           java.util.Collection<? extends Command> agentCommands)
        Process a set of agent commands and work out what communications each agent can hear.
        Parameters:
        time - The current time.
        agentCommands - The set of all agent commands this timestep.

      • getHearing

        java.util.Collection<Command> getHearing(Entity agent)
        Get the set of hear commands an agent can hear.
        Parameters:
        agent - The agent controlled entity.
        Returns:
        Set set of hear commands the agent can hear.
